Summary: solid shape"SPARKLER"gold,round,moving very slowly,making crackling sounds
divs: Sighting Detailsmy boyfriend and i were sitting up in the hollywood hills, fooling around,we took a break and were just looking out into the night,talking...we heard a sound, like cracking, looked around us, a practically in front of us, up bove us, not very far but so plain and clear, the edges, everything so clearly stood out, this ball, we slowly, crackling by us, little,flames coming out all around this ball, the view we had of it did not last long. we did not know what to think, we did not think it was a flying saucer, so it was not a ufo. The view of the sky of where we were was not very extensive, alot of plants and such, around.
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around November 30th 1965
